item.title: How to Keep Your Home Organized All Year Long
item.description: In many Indian households, maintaining a clean and organized home often becomes a seasonal activity—typically during Diwali or when relatives are visiting. But what if home organization became a consistent habit, rather than a festival chore? With the right mindset and a few smart strategies, keeping your home tidy and clutter-free throughout the year is not only achievable, but can also mak
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
